title: Gravity Globe
summaries: The Gravity Globe is a Hardmode, post-Moon Lord accessory that allows the holder to flip gravity, so that the player falls up instead of down, and toggle gravity back to normal afterward. Once equipped, pressing the â–² Up key toggles the gravity direction. This only affects the player with the item equipped. The Gravity Globe is always dropped from the Moon Lord's Treasure Bag in Expert Mode.
